name: FRACTALS OF DESTINY
description:
FRACTALS OF DESTINY developed by KRAKATOA STUDIOS is an exhilarating hybrid RPG that seamlessly combines the best features of action RPGs and classic RPGs. Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure where the beloved turn-based system intertwines with breathtaking action sequences, creating an accessible and captivating gameplay experience.
Fractals of Destiny offers an exhilarating blend of action, strategy, and exploration, ensuring every moment is filled with excitement. Immerse yourself in a rich narrative woven with interconnected side quests, each intricately tied to the main storyline, offering hidden surprises that can be unveiled by carefully following the available clues.


STORY

The year is 5823, and the universe is ravaged by a cataclysmic war between the Velixar Azartus of the west universe, led by the formidable Zeranos, and the light empire of the east universe, commanded by the legendary Anum'RA. This century-long conflict has left the universe on the brink of destruction, with united alliance unable to intervene due to dwindling troops and resources.

Amidst this chaos, a remarkable woman named Zerva emerges. Born of mixed race, she possesses extraordinary gifts that set her apart from ordinary people.
And only she can won this battle and then Rise in rank, become the greatest general of the United Alliance, and bring hope to the universe.

After the war, Zerva found her love with her partner, named Eldran, and together they vowed to keep the peace

However, destiny tells different…..

After her partner's mysterious demise, Zerva lost her power and her believes.


Talent System

Create your own build status that suits your playstyle on the battlefield.
